channel.title: Spruce up the forums
channel.description: Ever since this forum has been out, mopar has kept this boring theme on the forums. I think it's time to update and get a new theme for the forums. Personally, if I were running this site I'd have vBulletin which has a better default style, but since you aren't, do your website a favor and goto www.simplemachines.org and have a look. You'll almost definately find a theme that you'll like better and it would only take a few minutes to look at them...

item.dc:creator: @kloplop321 kloplop321

lol I didn’t know I could change it, but I would like to have a bit more of a choice

item.dc:creator: @error.login cane
item.description:
@error.login wrote:

Carson:

I post on Moparscape alot. I enjoy this site more, because it’s not all about stupid pixel servers.

them stupid pixle servers are not that dumb you dooche. They have a lot of potential but well just look around on moparscape and you will be able to answer the end of this question.

Read full topic

item.title: Spruce up the forums
item.dc:creator: @ada ada
item.description:
@ada wrote:

I never said there was anything wrong with the vBgreen theme… I didn’t know it was there… I was the one who gave you the idea to install it when you were approving my website. But I didn’t think to check the theme settings and so I made this thread…

Read full topic

item.title: Spruce up the forums
item.dc:creator: @Silver_Lining Silver Lining
item.description:
@Silver_Lining wrote:

[quote=“ada, post:16, topic:175225”][quote author=Silver Lining link=topic=235760.msg2009887#msg2009887 date=1201065508]

MITB’ers hate Moparscapers, because a lot of them post spam and stupid questions. There is just a small group of Moparscapers welcome here.

So I am welcome then?
[/quote]No.

You’re not very nice…
I’ve never done anything to you and I haven’t made any posts saying “hw do i play morpascape! just hlp me evn tho i postd on morpaisthebest.” so why are you so mean…[/quote]Perhaps, like you, I should end questions with ellipses. Should I eat chicken… Should I get off my ass and get a job… Should I try to pretend you deserve respect… Should I just keep lol’ing at you for failing at asking questions… Yeah, the answer to all but the last question is no.

Read full topic

item.title: Spruce up the forums
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

[quote=“ada, post:8, topic:175225”][quote author=Greeny link=topic=235760.msg2008938#msg2008938 date=1201016616]
There’s so many mods on this forum, and little tweaks made by mitb that if he were to add another theme it would probably screw up majorly.
[/quote]
Thats why I don’t really like the split forum idea. I can imagine that every time a package is installed, they have to tweak something for it to work. I don’t see what benefit there is with spliting the forums in two. He someone could explain why that happened, it would be appreciated. Was it a legal thing or what?[/quote]

we get enough spam from moparscape with there being another site… can you imagine how much spam there would be on this site if there wasnt moparisthebest.com

Read full topic

item.title: Spruce up the forums
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

[quote=“ada, post:8, topic:175225”][quote author=Greeny link=topic=235760.msg2008938#msg2008938 date=1201016616]
There’s so many mods on this forum, and little tweaks made by mitb that if he were to add another theme it would probably screw up majorly.
[/quote]
Thats why I don’t really like the split forum idea. I can imagine that every time a package is installed, they have to tweak something for it to work. I don’t see what benefit there is with spliting the forums in two. He someone could explain why that happened, it would be appreciated. Was it a legal thing or what?[/quote]

Moparscapers are the scum of the earth, they post their filth where they please with constant disregard for all rules.

The split kept most of them away but we still get at least 10-20 moparscape questions per day on this site. My idea for a long time has been to completely change the domain of this site to keep them all out.

[#h8moparscape]

Read full topic

Mopar asked of where I got my forum’s theme from ages ago and said he was going to install it, but I totally forgot about it.
